description: Structured information about a relationship between two entities, such as a person and their employer.
label: Affiliation
name: Affiliation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endDate._instruction: Enter the end date of this affiliation, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Leave blank if this affiliation is still current.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endDate.description: Date in the Gregorian calendar at which something terminates in time.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endDate.label: End date
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endDate.name: endDate

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/memberO._instruction: Add the organization or consortium another party was or still is a member of.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/memberO.label: Member of
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/memberO.name: memberOf

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startDa._instruction: Enter the start date of this affiliation, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startDa.description: Date in the Gregorian calendar at which something begins in time
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startDa.label: Start date
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startDa.name: startDate
